name: Falling With Style
description:
~~Falling with Style~~

(V4.0.0) You will likely die to bugs we are currently trying to work out, sorry for the frustration. 

This is a very early build of a game created by a small team of Drexel University Students in about ten weeks. Enjoy! And be sure to fill out the survey linked at the bottom!

***Mouse/Keyboard Recommended***

Swing with speed and style and you'll be fine!

Controls:

A/D or L joystick: move/swing

W/S or L joystick vertical: move up and down on rope (only while swinging)

LMB/ R trigger: Shoot/Unhook Grapple

Space/ L bumper: Jump/Unhook

Escape/ B button: Pause

Please fill out our quick survey, it really helps!

Survey: https://goo.gl/forms/uXgjz24lS67Tj2l42

V4

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com.
